title: There shall be no size restriction for bath or water closet unit
clause_text: There shall be no size restriction for bath or water closet unit. Moreover, for bathroom, water closest and for kitchen there shall be no stipulation of one wall abutting open space, etc. as long as artificial light and ventilation through any means are provided.
